title: Brandish Rusty Soul Complete Series EngSub Videos and Manga in E
description:
Brandish: Rusty Soul, is a manga series regarding a Succubus, that is rather awesome. This torrent includes BOTH the manga (in English), and the OVAs (videos), including subtitles in .ass, .sub, and .srt formats, for BOTH chapters. Other torrents of this did not have subs for Episode One, and the .ass file on another website is broken; so I put it all together in a nice, tidy package for you, as once you see the videos, you will probably also want to read the manga, or vice versa.

The videos are censored: All new hentai is, because the produces no longer do International (uncensored) released in ANY volume. This is due to loss of income from people INSIDE Japan, buying the International titles, often for less than the local versions would cost them. 

I have a long list of hentai that I wish was available as uncensored material, but it sadly is not, and may never be.
